text: If it's okay to promote one's works, I'm putting out a book on Tuesday October 6 about lessons learned in my nearly 30-year career in marketing, content and advertising: Bronze Seeks Silver. Has some hilarious stories and lessons about stewarding brands, building relationships and managing careers from my start as a secretary in an agency creative department to head of creative for OgilvyOne NY. Add your email to the launch list or pre-order an ebook or paperback when it's ready at <http://bronzeseekssilver.com/>

attachments.title: Bronze Seeks Silver | Lessons from a Creative Career in Marketing
